title: Caroline Kepnes - Hidden Bodies (You #2)
description:
Charmingly murderous antihero Joe continues his twisted quest for the perfect love in this thrilling follow-up to the â€œdeeply dark yet mesmerizingâ€ You (Booklist). When Joe follows the woman he wants to marry to the West Coast, he never imagines that his obsession will lead him to such tragedyâ€¦

After the heartbreak of losing his girlfriend, Beck, Joe Goldberg thought heâ€™d never love again. But when mysterious Amy Adam begins working for Joe at Mooney Books, he finds himself obsessed with his new employee. Amy is Beckâ€™s oppositeâ€”she hates Twitter, she doesnâ€™t even have an email address, she's completely unsearchable onlineâ€”and she quickly captures Joeâ€™s heart. But just before Joe can ask Amy to marry him, she disappears, leaving a trail of clues in her wake.

Joe is then forced to do something so vile, so awful that he nearly loses his mind: he moves to Los Angelesto find Amy. He is tortured by a series of aspiring Angelenosâ€”an insufferable stand-up comedian, philistine booksellers, a money-hungry nanny, and a slutty ghostwriterâ€”before meeting his ticket to a more luxurious world: a surgically enhanced, social mediaâ€“savvy heiress named Love Quinn. But Joe canâ€™t stop stalking Amy, despite the world opening up to him with Love on his arm. Will Joe finally escape his sordid past? Or is Love just the latest casualty in Joeâ€™s unrelenting search for the perfect match? 




Read by Santino Fontana
Format: MP3
Unabridged
